pageProduct.name: Optrex Advance Preservative Free Tired Eye Drops 10mL
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Optrex Advance Preservative Free Eye Drops for Tired and
Uncomfortable Eyes

Optrex Advance Refreshing Eye Drops are designed to help refresh and revitalise tired, uncomfortable eyes and is a preservative free formulation. Provides fast acting hydration and lasting comfort from tired and uncomfortable eyes.
 

Direction for Use:

Adults and Children (12+). Children must be supervised by an adult.

1. Wash hands before use

2. Remove seal prior to first use and remove cap

3. Tilt your head backwards and gently squeeze 1-2 drops into each eye

4. Blink a few times to ensure the whole eye is covered

5. Shake the bottle to remove any residual drops

6. Replace the bottle top tightly after use.

 

Ingredients:

Water, Sorbitol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride.

 

Important:

Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients.

Temporary blurring of vision may occur immediately after use of the eye drops. Wait until your vision is clear before continuing with activites that could be hazardous with blurred vision.

Occasionally these eye drops may cause a temporary mild stinging sensation for a few seconds after administration. If stinging persists, if you experience any other side effects of your symptoms worsen consult ahealthcare professional.

Leave at least 30 mins between using other eye drops.

Consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or breast-feeding. Do not swallow the solution. Do not share this product with another person. Avoid placing the tip of the bottle in contact with the eyelid, eye or any other surface

Product Claims: Fast acting hydration and lasting comfort for tired and uncomfortable eyes.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

Retain outer carton for future reference.
Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients. Temporary blurring of vision may occur immediately after use of the eye drops. Wait until your vision is clear before continuing with activities that could be hazardous with blurred vision.
Occasionally these eye drops may cause a temporary mild stinging sensation for a few seconds after administration. If stinging persists, if you experience any other side effects or your symptoms worsen consult a healthcare professional.
Leave at least 30 mins between using other eye drops.
Consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or breast-feeding. Do not swallow the solution. Do not share this product with another person. Avoid placing the tip of the bottle in contact with the eyelid, eye or any other surface.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26) or a doctor.



Ingredients

Water, Sorbitol, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Chloride

Directions

Adults and Children (12+). Children must be supervised by an adult.
1. Wash hands before use.
2. Remove seal prior to first use and remove cap.
3. Tilt your head backwards and gently squeeze 1-2 drops into each eye.
4. Blink a few times to ensure the whole eye is covered.
5. Shake the bottle to remove any residual drop.
6. Replace the bottle top tightly after use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Keep out of sight and reach of children. Store below 25°C. Do not freeze. Protect from sunlight.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
